import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' export const GroupUserRender = (object) => { const link = `/message/g/${object.object._id}`; return(
{object.object.name}
) } export const ChatGroupRender = (Objects) => { let { id } = useParams(); //const socket = io("ws://localhost:5000") const name = Objects.find(group => group._id === id).name return(
  {name}
) }
